name: Speed Factory
description:
Speed Factory is a crazy combination of old style "Pipe Mania" with Factorio-like production!

The goal of the game is to reach $1000
Complete orders to receive $$$
Fail to complete will result in $$$ penalty
$0 = GAME OVER

CONTROLS:
F2 to toggle HELP screen
L-Click on any MACHINE or CONVEYOR BELT to ROTATE
L-Click on OUTPUT to ACTIVATE / DEACTIVATE
F6 to RESTART
ESC to EXIT
